OOC: It is moding.  I have to post damage for the base.  yes, Scourge is 
there.  Popular opninon on the internet says Thundercracker became Scourge, 
by the way.

::The Deathcon/Cyclonus/Scourge::

::The Deathcon's scanners see Halucigen and the autoguns automatically start 
firing at Halucigen::
~~~~~
::Cyclonus and Scourge see Ultra Megatron::
Scourge: Megatron is right, size does not measure power.
Cyclonus: You are no Megatron.
::they load their guns, ready for battle::

--part1_2d.af122ba.281e1346_boundary
